C

CentimetersConversionArea - Class in model
This class represents the yellow centimeters conversion box.
CentimetersConversionArea(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class model.CentimetersConversionArea
This is the default constructor for this class which sets up all the parameters of the CentimetersConversionArea invariants: textArea size, textArea bounds are always positive preconditions: upperX, upperY, rows, and cols must be positive postconditions: a new CentimetersConversionArea will be initialized
clickUpdate() - Method in class controller.Invoker
This method executes the provided updates read/write via the MenubarListener invariants: none preconditions: none postconditions: the read/write for the update is executed
cmToFeet(String) - Method in class model.ValueToConvert
This method converts the centimeter value to feet invariants: the centimeter value is always positive preconditions: the centimeters is positive postconditions: the converted feet value is returned
cmToMeter(String) - Method in class model.ValueToConvert
This method converts the centimeter value to meters invariants: the centimeter value is always positive preconditions: the centimeters is positive postconditions: the converted meters value is returned
Command - Interface in controller
This interface defines the execute method which is used in the ReadRequest and WriteRequest classes to output a message regarding the states of the model
controller - package controller
 
ConverterApp - Class in main
This class simulates a ConverterApp that converts a centimeter value to feet value, meter value and display them in corresponding views.
ConverterApp() - Constructor for class main.ConverterApp
 
ConverterMenuBar - Class in view
This class extends JMenuBar which represents the type Converter menu bar
ConverterMenuBar(ActionListener) - Constructor for class view.ConverterMenuBar
This is the constructor which instantiates a new Converter menu bar.
ConverterPanel - Class in view
This class extends JPanel which represents a ConverterPanel type
ConverterPanel() - Constructor for class view.ConverterPanel
This is the default constructor which instantiates a new Converter panel invariants: valueToConvert value is always non-negative preconditions: None postconditions: a new Converter panel with three text areas will be instantiated
